
首次上传 需要git remote add origin https://github.com/weichangk/Weick.Learn.Solution.git
git init
touch .gitignore
git add .
git commit -m "first commit"
git remote add origin https://github.com/weichangk/Weick.Learn.Solution.git
git push -u origin master



新增文件
git status  查看状态
git add .  在有文件过滤的条件下可以git add .      或者一个个文件添加
git commit -m "xxx"   提交新增的文件并备注信息
git push -u origin master   推送到仓库




原来GitHub已经有了一个官方的为Visual Studio项目量身定做的gitignore文件，直接在项目根目录下提交这个文件即可。

## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (MonoDevelop/Xamarin Studio)
*.userprefs

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/

# Visual Studio 2015 cache/options directory
.vs/
# Uncomment if you have tasks that create the
